reviews.review: Great game. I want to try and get all the achievements but I completed the story in 4 hours. Worth it and alot of fun.
as soon as I started thinking with portals my brain expanded beyond comprehension

I have no idea how i didn't play this game until now as of 2021.
The ending was so fulfilling
11/10 would recommend this game.

Jetzt habe ich diesen Klassiker endlich mal nachgeholt. Auch 2021 macht das Spiel unglaublich viel Spa√ü. Durch die kurze Spielzeit habe ich Portal in einem Rutsch wegspielen k√∂nnen. Das ist sehr angenehm zu den ausufernden Games wie AC oder jegliches andere Ubisoft-Games heutzutage. Ich zocke jetzt Portal 2...

Please read this review thoroughly:
The puzzles are way to hard and it's like you need a portal to do everything. Even if the puzzles were easier the game would be a lot less fun and the game overall sucks. I feel as if I need help with every puzzle. You get absolutley NO context on what to do and you need to figure out what to do by yourself. And the robot "helping" you just tells you where to go and brings you down as if you're just a lab rat and a test subject. There are robots EVERYWHERE and I would not recommend the game. The only thing about Portal is the graphics quality.
I played this on xbox 360 orange box. still a good game just got it on pc for mounting onto gmod
one of the best puzzle games to ever be on the earth
The game aged very well, quite a lot of thinking, especially for the challenge map. The length of the game is optimum, end just before you start feeling bored and annoyed.

I think everyone knows this game is good by now. I can go into why but I real quick just want to say to this day I have no idea how they made this system work. Like, holy crap. My only complaint is it's a little short. I've finished the game in 6 hours and being frank I feel like it took me longer than intended. Definitely good but I'd wait for a sale to pick it up. Worth every minute I played tho.

This game is one I come back to so many times. You can beat it in an hour and it still feels fresh every time and you always find something new about it. A timeless classic that is always good fun.

Except the challenges. Have yet to beat those.

Even eleven years later, this game is still amazing. It still looks pretty good too, in my opinion. It runs super well even on my terribly underpowered laptop, and was just a great game to relax to. It gets bonus points for having a native Linux version and not requiring Proton or any other tools like that.

very fun honestly, the game introduces mechanics to you at a steady pace that feels very natural. The puzzles were fun and varied, and never felt stale.
also using a portal high up on a wall and placing another portal below you as you fall to launch yourself really far is SO SATISFYING OH MY GOD
also the writing is 10/10

La mec√°nica de portal es bastante simple, pasas por un portal y sales por el otro. Lo que hace un gran juego a portal es el gran dise√±o de niveles creando situaciones donde implementas las nuevas mec√°nicas que aprendes a lo largo de los niveles los cuales tienen un gradual aumento de dificultad, que no los hace imposibles ni f√°ciles, creando un juego muy entretenido y desafiante a la vez.La jugabilidad es muy buena y no permite que te estreses ya que como mencione antes el mayor desafio de portal es resolver los puzzles usando la mecanica de los portales.

before you buy: This is a game.

Have you ever felt like you wanted to play a simple game with no complex backstory? Have you ever wanted to get some ez cake? Have you ever wanted to destroy your only friend in an [Insert spoiler here]. Here is the game

Amazing game, the mechanics were amazing and fun. The overall gameplay starts out easy, then gets more challenging as it goes along. It's always fun and easy to come back to.
I'd recommend the sequel as well.
